name: Trashy Dodge
description:
This is an endless game in which you play as a fish trying to dodge trash. Made for seajam with pygame and my first game. If u like it send money else ill kill ur family....

OK I JUST FOUND OUT THAT PYGAME EXES ARE WORTHLESS BECAUSE OF SOME FAKE VIRUS WARNINGS SO IM JUST GONNA UPLOAD THE SOURCE CODE FOR INTERESTED PEEPS ON GITHUB
